DataPersistence

Contains logic for storing and retrieving values from persisted storage on the PC

Functions
AddVariable
call DataPersistence.AddVariable(
variableName,
value
);

Add a numeric variable to the storage service

Parameters
variableName

the lookup name for the value

value

the value to persist

AddStringVariable
call DataPersistence.AddStringVariable(
variableName,
value
);

Add a string variable to the storage service

Parameters
variableName

the lookup name for the value

value

the (string) value to persist

GetVariable
call DataPersistence.GetVariable(
variableName,
&value
);

Retrieve a numeric variable from the storage service

Parameters
variableName

the lookup name for the value

&value

the variable into which to read the persisted value

GetStringVariable
call DataPersistence.GetStringVariable(
variableName,
&value
);

Retrieve a string variable from the storage service

Parameters
variableName

the lookup name for the value

&value

the variable into which to read the persisted value

SetVariable
call DataPersistence.SetVariable(
variableName,
value
);

Set a previously added variable

Parameters
variableName

the lookup name for the value

value

the new value

See Also

DataPersistence.AddVariable

SetStringVariable
call DataPersistence.SetStringVariable(
variableName,
value
);

Set a previously added string variable

Parameters
variableName

the lookup name for the value

value

the new (string) value

See Also

DataPersistence.AddStringVariable
